resources.string: Centres your screen to the direction in which you\'re facing.
Changes your screen\'s colour palette to a warmer look.
To reach Universal Menu and exit an app, hold down the back button at any time. Press the back button now to return to the tutorial.
This feature is not available while live-streaming is active.
Tap the touchpad to reorientate the menu
You\'re currently in a party that has pending invitations.
Once you\'ve joined, you will be able to chat or join an app together.
If you plan to speak during the live-stream, plug in your headphones so that your voice is recorded clearly.
Your live-stream video has been posted to Facebook.
Rooms app is not currently installed.

After you join, you\'ll be able to chat, hang out in VR or join an app together. We require the use of headphones with Oculus Parties to provide the best audio experience for the group. Please plug in your headphones now.
We require the use of headphones with Oculus Parties to provide the best audio experience for the group. Please plug in your headphones now.
You can only be in one party at a time. Select Leave Party + Join to leave your current party and join %1$s.
You can only be in one party at a time. If you join %1$s\'s party, your other invitations will be cancelled, but you can invite those friends to %2$s\'s party if you wish.
Up to four people can join a party at a time
Your current app is reserving your microphone, so your friends won\'t be able to hear you. To start a party, exit to Home and go to the Party tab.
Your current app is reserving your microphone, so your friends won\'t be able to hear you. To invite them to a party, exit to Home and go to the Party tab.
Your current app is reserving your microphone, so your friends won\'t be able to hear you. To join the party, exit to Home and accept the invitation from the Party tab within the next few minutes.
Your current app is reserving your microphone and isn\'t allowing you to invite your party to join you.
Your current app is using your microphone. To talk to your friends, exit your current app or meet in Oculus Rooms.
You won\'t be able to talk to your friends when using this app. Party VoIP will resume when you close this app.
There are still invitations to this party that haven\'t been accepted yet. If you leave now, all invitations to this party will be cancelled.
To live-stream to Facebook, you\'ll first need to link your Facebook account. Please remove your mobile device from the headset now to begin this process.
%1$s doesn\'t allow you to live-stream their app.
The app you\'re trying to open with %1$s needs to reserve your microphone. You\'ll remain in this party, but you won\'t be able to hear or talk to anyone in it until you exit this app.

Customer safety is Oculus\' top priority. Oculus is removing support for all Note 7 devices on the Oculus platform. Until further notice, Note 7 devices will not be compatible with the Gear VR. For more information regarding the Note 7, please contact Samsung directly.
Please be conscious of your VR community. Get permission from other players before you broadcast content containing their names, voices or other information.
